com.koverse.sdk.sink

Class AbstractSink.SinkMapReduceContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.koverse.sdk.sink.AbstractSink.SinkMapReduceContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapReduceContext
    Enclosing class:
    AbstractSink

    public class AbstractSink.SinkMapReduceContext
extends Object
implements MapReduceContext
    Ad-hoc MapReduceContext implementation. Does not support most operations. Only supports getting the parameters and collection schema.

    • Nested Class Summary
